name: Unity 2D shooter: Lost ship!
description:
This is my 2D shooter project from the Coursera course about Game Design and Development

Modifications:

- Added 3rd level

- Enemy position is modified in each level, being the 3rd one the most everwhelming

- The amount of enemies required to beat each level is modified, requiring  more enemies for each level

Credits:

Created by Jesus Alexander Molina Gomez
